column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The free admission on Thursdays from 5-8pm is an absolute steal. If you were to pay the $18 admission
column2: you can't help but feel obligated to stay for an entire day. As tourists with limited time
column4: it's not enough time to check out everything the museum has to offer. But there's an insert within the free guide that lists some of the "must-see" paintings and exhibits.
